TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Suriname, title = Suriname, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suriname} }

S.FORM: Suriname hya' ga cyux maki' tay 4 00 N, 56 00 W na Nan-Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 163,820 sq km (maki' tay 92ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 156,000 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 7,820 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 585,824. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 0.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 94.60%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 4.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Paramaribo. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 25 na tay mawpuw qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Dési Bouterse, aring ryax 12 squ byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2010 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Soriname hya' ga cyox maki' tay 4 00 N, 56 00 W na Nan-Meco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 163,820 sq km (maki' tay 92ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 156,000 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 7,820 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 585,824. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 0.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 94.60%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 4.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Paramaribo. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 25 na tay mawpow qotox byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Dési Booterse, aring ryax 12 sqo byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2010 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
